verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: And] [ARGM-DIS: so] [ARG1: it] [V: begins] . Rudy Giuliani is openly threatening some vague action against Robert Mueller if he does not wrap up his investigation soon , with or without interviewing Donald Trump . He does n’t say what those actions might be , but it almost certainly includes Trump firing him . Trump and his lawyers are trying to set up …
